#### Exercise 1.1
##### Part (a)
```{r 1.1a}
w = rnorm(100 + 50) #extra 50 to avoid startup issues
x = filter(w, filter=c(0, -0.9), method="recursive")[-(1:50)]
v = filter(x, sides=2, filter=rep(1/4, 4))
tsplot(x, main="Autoregression & Moving Average")
lines(v, lty=2, col=2)
```

##### Part (b)
```{r 1.1b}
t = 1:250
cs = 2*cos((2*pi*t)/4)
w = rnorm(250)
tsplot( cs+w, col = 4)
```
